name: Agentic Nushell Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y curl wget jq git ripgrep fd-find bat
mkdir -p scripts/agents scripts/agui scripts/mcp scripts/api scripts/utils tests config examples

cat > ~/.config/nushell/config.nu << 'EOF'
# Agentic Nushell Configuration

$env.config = {
  show_banner: false
  table: {
    mode: rounded
  }
  completions: {
    case_sensitive: false
    quick: true
    partial: true
    algorithm: "fuzzy"
  }
  filesize: {
    metric: true
    format: "auto"
  }
  cursor_shape: {
    vi_insert: line
    vi_normal: block
  }
  color_config: $dark_theme
  use_grid_icons: true
  footer_mode: "25"
  float_precision: 2
  buffer_editor: "code"
  use_ansi_coloring: true
  bracketed_paste: true
  edit_mode: emacs
  shell_integration: {
    osc2: true
    osc7: true
    osc8: true
    osc9_9: false
    osc133: true
    osc633: true
    reset_application_mode: true
  }
  render_right_prompt_on_last_line: false
  hooks: {
    pre_prompt: [{ ||
      if (which direnv | is-empty) {
        return
      }
      direnv export json | from json | default {} | load-env
    }]
  }
}

# Agent-specific aliases
alias ll = ls -la
alias la = ls -a
alias ..= cd ..
alias ...= cd ../..
alias grep = rg
alias find = fd
alias cat = bat

# Agent development aliases
alias agent-start = "nu scripts/agents/start-agent.nu"
alias agent-test = "nu scripts/agents/test-agent.nu"
alias agent-deploy = "nu scripts/agents/deploy-agent.nu"
alias pipeline-run = "nu scripts/agui/run-pipeline.nu"
alias mcp-connect = "nu scripts/mcp/connect.nu"

# Environment info
def "agent env" [] {
  {
    environment: "agentic-nushell"
    version: "0.1.0"
    nu_version: (version | get version)
    mcp_server: ($env.MCP_SERVER_URL? | default "http://localhost:3001")
    status: "ready"
  }
}
EOF

cat > scripts/agents/start-agent.nu << 'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env nu

# Start Nushell Agent Server
# Provides HTTP interface for agent interactions

use agent-framework.nu *

def main [
  --port: int = 8000
  --host: string = "0.0.0.0"
] {
  print $"ðŸš€ Starting Nushell Agent Server on ($host):($port)"
  
  # Create basic HTTP server using Python
  let server_script = '
import http.server
import socketserver
import json
import urllib.parse
import subprocess
import os

class AgentHandler(http.server.BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
    def do_GET(self):
        if self.path == "/health":
            self.send_response(200)
            self.send_header("Content-type", "application/json")
            self.end_headers()
            response = {"status": "healthy", "service": "agentic-nushell", "version": "0.1.0"}
            self.wfile.write(json.dumps(response).encode())
        elif self.path == "/agents":
            self.send_response(200)
            self.send_header("Content-type", "application/json")
            self.end_headers()
            # Call Nushell to get agents
            result = subprocess.run(["nu", "-c", "use scripts/agents/agent-framework.nu *; agent list | to json"], 
                                  capture_output=True, text=True, cwd="/workspace")
            if result.returncode == 0:
                self.wfile.write(result.stdout.encode())
            else:
                self.wfile.write(b"[]")
        else:
            self.send_response(404)
            self.end_headers()
    
    def do_POST(self):
        if self.path.startswith("/agents/") and self.path.endswith("/process"):
            # Extract agent ID
            agent_id = self.path.split("/")[2]
            
            # Read request body
            content_length = int(self.headers["Content-Length"])
            post_data = self.rfile.read(content_length)
            
            try:
                message = json.loads(post_data.decode())
                
                # Call Nushell agent processing
                cmd = f"use scripts/agents/agent-framework.nu *; agent process {agent_id} {{content: \"{message.get(\"content\", \"\")}\", role: \"{message.get(\"role\", \"user\")}\"}}"
                result = subprocess.run(["nu", "-c", cmd], 
                                      capture_output=True, text=True, cwd="/workspace")
                
                self.send_response(200)
                self.send_header("Content-type", "application/json")
                self.end_headers()
                
                if result.returncode == 0:
                    response = {"success": True, "data": result.stdout, "agent_id": agent_id}
                else:
                    response = {"success": False, "error": result.stderr, "agent_id": agent_id}
                
                self.wfile.write(json.dumps(response).encode())
            except Exception as e:
                self.send_response(400)
                self.send_header("Content-type", "application/json")
                self.end_headers()
                response = {"error": str(e)}
                self.wfile.write(json.dumps(response).encode())

with socketserver.TCPServer(("", 8000), AgentHandler) as httpd:
    print("Nushell Agent Server running on port 8000")
    httpd.serve_forever()
'
  
  # Save and run the server
  $server_script | save scripts/agents/http_server.py
  python scripts/agents/http_server.py
}
EOF

nu -c 'use scripts/agents/agent-framework.nu *; agent create "DefaultAgent" "automation_agent" --description "Default Nushell automation agent"' || echo 'Agent creation will be available after first shell'
